Shows the amount of free and used memor: Displays information about system users
Searches for files and directories within a directory hierarchy
Clears the terminal screen of previous commands and output
Terminates the current shell session
Displays text or variables on the command line
Global regular expression print searches files for matching patterns
Disk free shows available disk space on filesystems
Change ownership changes file or directory ownership
Creates shortcuts for commands
Concatenate reads and displays the contents of files
Change mode modifies file or directory permissions
Displays who is currently logged in to the system
Task manager displays active processes and system resource usage in real-time
Send signal to terminate a process by process ID (PID)
Process status displays information about active processes
Build automation tool compiles and links programs using a 'Makefile' to determine how
GNU Compiler Collection compiles C source code into an executable program
GNU C++ Compiler compiles C++ source code into an executable program
Manual displays the user manual for a command
Secure Copy copies files securely between hosts over a network
Secure Shell remotely access another machine over a network using encryption
Move moves or renames files and directories
Copy duplicates files or directories from one location to another
Remove deletes files or directories (use with caution for directories)
Remove directory deletes an empty directory
Make directory creates a new directory
Change directory used to navigate between directories
List displays the file and directory names in the current working directory
Print working directory displays the current working directory path
